a.definition: The first letter of the English alphabet; indefinite article used before consonant sounds
a.spelling_importance: Fundamental vowel for word formation and article usage

b.definition: The second letter of the English alphabet; a consonant
b.spelling_importance: Common initial consonant for many words

c.definition: The third letter of the English alphabet; a consonant with hard and soft sounds
c.phonetic_sound: hard k sound or soft s sound

d.definition: The fourth letter of the English alphabet; a voiced consonant
d.spelling_importance: Common consonant for word beginnings and endings

e.definition: The fifth letter of the English alphabet; the most common vowel in English
e.phonetic_sound: ee sound as in see, or eh sound as in bed
e.spelling_importance: Most frequently used letter in English, essential for word formation

f.definition: The sixth letter of the English alphabet; a voiceless consonant

g.definition: The seventh letter of the English alphabet; a consonant with hard and soft sounds
g.phonetic_sound: hard g sound as in go, or soft j sound as in giant

h.definition: The eighth letter of the English alphabet; an aspirated consonant
h.phonetic_sound: huh sound as in house, sometimes silent
h.spelling_importance: Breath consonant, often silent in some words

i.definition: The ninth letter of the English alphabet; a vowel and first person pronoun
i.phonetic_sound: eye sound as in ice, or ih sound as in bit
i.spelling_importance: Essential vowel and most important pronoun in English

j.definition: The tenth letter of the English alphabet; a voiced consonant
j.spelling_importance: Distinctive consonant sound for word formation

k.definition: The eleventh letter of the English alphabet; a voiceless consonant
k.phonetic_sound: kuh sound as in king, sometimes silent
k.spelling_importance: Hard consonant, sometimes silent before n

l.definition: The twelfth letter of the English alphabet; a liquid consonant
l.spelling_importance: Liquid consonant essential for word flow

m.definition: The thirteenth letter of the English alphabet; a nasal consonant
m.spelling_importance: Nasal consonant, fundamental for many words

n.definition: The fourteenth letter of the English alphabet; a nasal consonant
n.spelling_importance: Essential nasal consonant for word endings and beginnings

o.definition: The fifteenth letter of the English alphabet; a round vowel
o.phonetic_sound: oh sound as in open, or aw sound as in dog

p.definition: The sixteenth letter of the English alphabet; a voiceless plosive consonant
p.phonetic_sound: puh sound as in people, sometimes silent
p.spelling_importance: Plosive consonant, sometimes silent before s

q.definition: The seventeenth letter of the English alphabet; always followed by u in English
q.phonetic_sound: kw sound when followed by u
q.spelling_importance: Unique consonant always paired with u in English

r.definition: The eighteenth letter of the English alphabet; a liquid consonant
r.spelling_importance: Liquid consonant crucial for word pronunciation

s.definition: The nineteenth letter of the English alphabet; a sibilant consonant
s.phonetic_sound: suh sound as in sun, or z sound in some words
s.spelling_importance: Sibilant consonant, essential for plurals and verb forms

t.definition: The twentieth letter of the English alphabet; a voiceless plosive consonant
t.spelling_importance: Common plosive consonant for word formation

u.definition: The twenty-first letter of the English alphabet; a back vowel
u.phonetic_sound: yoo sound as in use, or uh sound as in but

v.definition: The twenty-second letter of the English alphabet; a voiced fricative consonant
v.spelling_importance: Voiced fricative consonant for word formation

w.definition: The twenty-third letter of the English alphabet; a semivowel consonant
w.phonetic_sound: wuh sound as in water, sometimes silent
w.spelling_importance: Semivowel consonant, sometimes silent before r

x.definition: The twenty-fourth letter of the English alphabet; represents multiple sounds
x.phonetic_sound: ks sound as in box, or z sound at word beginning
x.spelling_importance: Complex consonant representing multiple sound combinations

y.definition: The twenty-fifth letter of the English alphabet; functions as vowel and consonant
y.phonetic_sound: yuh sound as in yes, or ee/eye sound as vowel
y.spelling_importance: Versatile letter functioning as both vowel and consonant

z.definition: The twenty-sixth letter of the English alphabet; the final letter
z.spelling_importance: Final letter of alphabet, voiced sibilant consonant

alphabet.definition: A set of letters or symbols in a fixed order used to represent the basic sounds of a language
alphabet.spelling_importance: Essential concept for literacy and language learning

the.definition: Definite article used to specify a particular noun

be.definition: To exist, occur, or have reality; auxiliary verb for continuous tenses
examples: To be or not to be

to.definition: Preposition expressing direction, place, or position; infinitive marker

of.definition: Expressing relationship between part and whole; belonging to

and.definition: Used to connect words, phrases, or clauses; conjunction meaning also

in.definition: Expressing location or position within limits; inside

have.definition: To possess, own, or hold; auxiliary verb for perfect tenses

it.definition: Pronoun referring to a thing previously mentioned or easily identified

for.definition: In support of; intended to belong to; during the period of

not.definition: Used to express negation, denial, refusal, or prohibition

on.definition: Physically in contact with and supported by a surface

with.definition: Accompanied by; having; using as an instrument

as.definition: Used in comparisons; in the capacity of; while

you.definition: Second person pronoun referring to the person being addressed

do.definition: To perform an action; auxiliary verb for questions and negatives

at.definition: Expressing location or arrival in a particular place

this.definition: Used to identify a specific person or thing close at hand

but.definition: Used to introduce something contrasting with what has been said

his.definition: Belonging to or associated with a male person previously mentioned

by.definition: Identifying the agent performing an action; near; through

from.definition: Indicating the point in space or time at which something starts

they.definition: Third person plural pronoun referring to people or things

we.definition: First person plural pronoun including the speaker and others

say.definition: To utter words; to express in words

her.definition: Belonging to or associated with a female person; objective case of she

an.definition: Indefinite article used before words beginning with vowel sounds

will.definition: Expressing future tense; determination or intention

my.definition: Belonging to or associated with the speaker

one.definition: The number 1; a single person or thing

all.definition: Used to refer to the whole quantity or extent of something

would.definition: Past tense of will; used to express conditional mood

there.definition: In, at, or to that place or position

their.definition: Belonging to or associated with people or things previously mentioned

up.definition: Towards a higher place or position; completely

out.definition: Moving away from the inside; not at home or work

about.definition: On the subject of; concerning; approximately

who.definition: What or which person or people

get.definition: Come to have or hold; receive; become

which.definition: Used to introduce a defining or non-defining relative clause

go.definition: Move from one place to another; travel; leave

me.definition: Used by a speaker to refer to himself or herself as object

when.definition: At what time; at the time that

make.definition: Form something by putting parts together; cause to happen

can.definition: Be able to; have permission to

like.definition: Having similar characteristics; find agreeable or enjoyable

time.definition: The indefinite continued progress of existence and events

no.definition: Used to give a negative response; not any

just.definition: Exactly; recently; only; fair and reasonable

him.definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to a male

know.definition: Be aware of through observation, inquiry, or information

take.definition: Lay hold of; carry or bring with one; require

people.definition: Human beings in general or considered collectively

into.definition: Expressing movement or action with result of being enclosed

year.definition: A period of twelve months; age of a person

your.definition: Belonging to or associated with the person being addressed

good.definition: To be desired or approved of; having required qualities

some.definition: An unspecified amount or number of; at least one

could.definition: Past tense of can; used to indicate possibility

them.definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to people or things

see.definition: Perceive with the eyes; discern visually; understand

other.definition: Used to refer to a different or distinct person or thing

than.definition: Introducing the second element in a comparison

then.definition: At that time; next; in that case

now.definition: At the present time or moment

look.definition: Direct one's gaze toward; have the appearance of

only.definition: And no one or nothing more besides; exclusively

come.definition: Move or travel toward or into a place; arrive

its.definition: Belonging to or associated with a thing previously mentioned

over.definition: Extending directly upward from; more than; finished

think.definition: Have a particular opinion, belief, or idea; use one's mind

work.definition: Activity involving mental or physical effort; be employed

life.definition: The condition that distinguishes animals and plants from inorganic matter

way.definition: A method, style, or manner of doing something; path or route

may.definition: Expressing possibility; asking for or giving permission

back.definition: In the direction that is the reverse of forward; return

through.definition: Moving in one side and out of the other; by way of

day.definition: A period of twenty-four hours; the time of light between sunrise and sunset

use.definition: Take, hold, or deploy as a means of accomplishing something

new.definition: Not existing before; made, introduced, or discovered recently

here.definition: In, at, or to this place or position

old.definition: Having lived for a long time; no longer young; former

two.definition: The number 2; equivalent to the sum of one and one

how.definition: In what way or manner; by what means; to what extent

our.definition: Belonging to or associated with the speaker and one or more others

has.definition: Third person singular present of have; possesses

had.definition: Past tense of have; possessed in the past

let.definition: Allow to; not prevent or forbid; used to make suggestions

put.definition: Move to or place in a particular position

too.definition: To a higher degree than is desirable; also; in addition

why.definition: For what reason or purpose; the reason for which

great.definition: Of ability, quality, or eminence considerably above average

big.definition: Of considerable size, extent, or intensity

group.definition: A number of people or things that are located, gathered, or classed together

world.definition: The earth, together with all of its countries and peoples

school.definition: An institution for educating children or adults

still.definition: Up to and including the present time; nevertheless

try.definition: Make an attempt or effort to do something

last.definition: Coming after all others in time or order; most recent

ask.definition: Say something in order to obtain an answer or information

kind.definition: Having or showing a friendly, generous, or considerate nature

hand.definition: The end part of a person's arm beyond the wrist

high.definition: Of great vertical extent; far above ground or sea level

country.definition: A nation with its own government, occupying a particular territory

point.definition: A particular spot, place, or position; the tapered end of something

small.definition: Of a size that is less than normal or usual

turn.definition: Move in a circular direction; change direction

right.definition: Morally good; correct; the opposite of left

move.definition: Go in a specified direction; change position

thing.definition: An object that one need not, cannot, or does not wish to give a specific name to

place.definition: A particular position, point, or area in space; a location

own.definition: Belonging to oneself; possess as property

where.definition: In or to what place or position

much.definition: A large amount of; to a great extent

every.definition: Used to refer to all the individual members of a set

those.definition: Used to identify specific people or things observed or heard

water.definition: A colorless, transparent, odorless liquid that forms seas, lakes, rivers

long.definition: Measuring a great distance from end to end; for a long time

little.definition: Small in size, amount, or degree; young

very.definition: Used for emphasis; to a high degree

after.definition: In the time following an event; behind in place

word.definition: A single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing

house.definition: A building for human habitation; a family or dynasty

never.definition: At no time in the past or future; not ever

another.definition: Used to refer to an additional person or thing of the same type

seem.definition: Give the impression of being something or having a quality

something.definition: A thing that is unspecified or unknown

need.definition: Require something because it is essential or very important

well.definition: In a good or satisfactory way; in good health

large.definition: Of considerable or relatively great size, extent, or capacity

must.definition: Used to indicate obligation, duty, or correctness

even.definition: Used to emphasize something surprising; flat and smooth

such.definition: Of the type previously mentioned; to so high a degree

hello.definition: A greeting used when meeting someone
examples: She gave a warm hello to everyone.

conversation.definition: An informal talk between two or more people
examples: We had a long conversation about books.
The art of conversation is dying.

understand.definition: To comprehend the meaning of something

artificial.definition: Made by humans rather than occurring naturally

intelligence.definition: The ability to learn, understand, and think

examples: I learned about the meeting yesterday.

knowledge.definition: Information and understanding gained through experience
examples: She has extensive knowledge of history.
To my knowledge, he's never been here.

explain.definition: To make something clear by describing it
examples: Can you explain how this works?
She's an important person in the company.
Can you help me with this?
I need help with my homework.

problem.definition: A difficult situation requiring a solution
examples: We have a problem to solve.
We found a solution to the issue.

similar.definition: Having a resemblance without being identical

example.definition: A thing that illustrates a general rule
examples: Can you give me an example?
She's a good example to follow.
I need more information about this topic.
